interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Stride Foot Cream Smoothes Rough Cracked Heels & Dry Skin –– Dematologist-Developed, Intensely Moisturizing Foot Cream with Aloe Vera, Coconut oil and Green tea Review Date: 2022/09/10 Store: Stride Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Stride', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Active Ingredients': 'Coconut oil,green tea,vitamin e', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 2 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '860006643317'} Review Text: I definitely like the way this cream makes my feet 👣 feel. I am a particular person that does not like to have dry skin or calluses on my 👣 feet. It’s important that I have a lotion that makes my feet 👣 soft and smooth. This also has a somewhat cooling feeling to it which is nice. Occasionally in the middle of the night my feet 👣 will start getting very warm/hot and it’s very uncomfortable. Twice now I’ve been able to apply this cream and it soothes and cools my feet 👣 making them comfortable enough to be able to sleep.

EXPIRATION DATE: 06/11/2024
I always check for expiration dates prior to using. This expiration date tells me the product hasn’t been sitting somewhere, but was recently produced for distribution. Review Title: Soothes my feels 👣 Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Everyday Beauty Glow Day Cream, Gel-to-Oil Rich Moisturizer to Minimize Signs of Aging, Reduce Redness, Dullness, and Fatigue for a Healthy Glow, 1 oz. Jar Everyday Beauty {'Brand': 'Everyday Beauty', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '2.56 x 2.52 x 1.93 inches; 4.66 Ounces', 'UPC': '700463002381', 'Manufacturer': 'Cosmetic Solutions, LLC'} I really like the feel of gel moisturizers when they go onto my face. There’s something about them that is super absorbent, yet extremely moisturizing. This particular cream/gel is exactly the same way. Did not leave a sticky/greasy feel/look at all on my face, it actually absorbed very quickly. It has a slight fragrant smell, nothing too extreme and it is did not irritate my skin at all. I have very sensitive skin and have to be careful about which products I use. It’s kept my face completely moisturized & glowing throughout the day.
My ONLY Issue with this product is the price. It’s a bit much for something that I need to use twice daily.
DISCLAIMER:
📝Yes, I am a VINE 🗣VOICE member. EVERY product that I review was selected by ME & ONLY ME. The product or item is ALWAYS something that is needed and will be used in my Home🏡 & Yard 🌱🍃, or for my FAMILY 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦& Pets🦮🐾🐈‍⬛, or JUST FOR ME 💁🏻‍♀️. It’s more of a GEL moisturizer than a CREAM👍⭐️ seedling Heated Eye Mask for Dry Eyes, Eye Compress Moist Heat, Silk sleep mask for dry eye relief, Plant Extract Warm Compress for Eyes, Stye Eye Therapy Mask (Blue) Seedling {'Brand': 'Seedling', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9.2 x 4.2 x 0.6 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '9.2 x 4.2 x 0.6 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'M', 'Manufacturer': 'seedling', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} I have trouble every so often with my tear ducts clogging. If you’ve ever had them clogged before than you know the discomfort that comes with it. I’ve actually had a tube put in my right tear duct to clear a blockage and that is dreadful to go through. It has been recommended that I use warm/hot (not scolding) compress to help keep my tear ducts draining. I’m trying this mask to save time. It’s easier than standing at the sink and constantly warming up a wash cloths with the faucet. It’s definitely relaxing and I can feel how it is going to help me. I wear eye mask when I sleep so I’m already used to having a cover over my eyes. Recommended to prevent my tear ducts clogging again👍⭐️ Summer's Eve Spa Set for Women | Gift Box | Women's Post Shave Hydrating Serum, 1oz Tube | Cleansing Feminine Wash, 12oz Bottle Summer's Eve ["Give a special someone or pamper yourself and experience Daily Intimate Beauty with the Summer's Eve Spa gift set containing a Luxurious Cleansing Wash and an Intimate Serum. The Summer's Eve Spa Luxurious Cleansing Wash has a calming chamomile fragrance blended with essential oils. The creamy, pearly feminine wash is hypoallergenic and gynecologist tested, safe and gentle enough to use every day. Free from dyes and parabens, the wash cleanses and leaves the skin feeling pampered. Indulge in relaxation and renewal every day. The Summer's Eve Spa after shave Skin Serum was created for your most delicate intimate areas to comfortably hydrate, smooth and soften. Specifically designed to soothe delicate, freshly shaven or waxed intimate skin. 9 out of 10 women say the serum soothed skin after shaving. The serum is infused with vitamin E, coconut oil and aloe. Elevate your intimate care routine with the cleansing wash and luxurious serum from our Summer’s Eve Spa Kit for Women Gift Set."] {'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Scent': 'Spa', 'Brand': "Summer's Eve", 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Active Ingredients': 'Lactic_acid', 'Product Dimensions': '8.87 x 2.22 x 9.32 inches; 1.34 Pounds', 'UPC': '041608002324', 'Manufacturer': 'Prestige Consumer Healthcare', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} I’ve been using Summer’s Eve Feminine Products for years. They have never caused me any irritation and always kept me feeling clean and refreshed. With this being a new product of theirs, of course I needed to try it right away.
Minimal scent with the Wash and Fragrance FREE for the serum. I use the wash I as I always have with the other Summer’s Eve I have. I like that this is PH-Balanced. I use the serum on my bikini area after I’ve 🪒 shaved.

I have nothing but positive things to say about all Summer’s Eve products. I think all woman should care for their intimate areas carefully and these products are the best for that. I have ALWAYS used Summer’s Eve⭐️👍 Stride Foot Cream Smoothes Rough Cracked Heels & Dry Skin –– Dematologist-Developed, Intensely Moisturizing Foot Cream with Aloe Vera, Coconut oil and Green tea Stride {'Brand': 'Stride', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Active Ingredients': 'Coconut oil,green tea,vitamin e', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 2 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '860006643317'} I definitely like the way this cream makes my feet 👣 feel. I am a particular person that does not like to have dry skin or calluses on my 👣 feet. It’s important that I have a lotion that makes my feet 👣 soft and smooth. This also has a somewhat cooling feeling to it which is nice. Occasionally in the middle of the night my feet 👣 will start getting very warm/hot and it’s very uncomfortable. Twice now I’ve been able to apply this cream and it soothes and cools my feet 👣 making them comfortable enough to be able to sleep.

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Focused on gel-based moisturizers for facial skincare and intimate care products that emphasize comfort and hydration. Recently purchased a moisturizing foot cream, indicating an expanded interest in effective solutions for foot care, especially for dry and rough skin.
- **Skin Type Sensitivity:** Prioritizes sensitive skin products, ensuring they are non-irritating and daily-use safe.
- **Aesthetic Feel:** Enjoys non-greasy, quick-absorbing formulas that promote hydration and a healthy glow. This preference extends to soothing foot care products that provide relief and comfort.
- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** Prefers mild or fragrance-free options, although open to light scents like coconut when the product meets effectiveness criteria.
- **Price Sensitivity:** Values affordability for regular use but is willing to invest in effective solutions for specific care needs, as shown by her willingness to try specialized foot products.
- **Engagement with Products:** Actively participates in reviews as a VINE member, sharing insights on skincare, health, and now foot care products, demonstrating a commitment to quality and user experience.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Generally enjoys product performance, offering constructive feedback especially regarding cost-effectiveness for frequent use.
- **Value for Quality:** Prioritizes effectiveness and user experience, particularly in products delivering immediate relief and long-term benefits, reflecting a holistic approach to personal care. 

This profile illustrates a discerning consumer dedicated to quality skincare, including facial, intimate, and foot care products.
